item.title: Ultimate Sheep Raccoon launches this winter for Switch 2, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Race to victory through a mayhem-filled obstacle course.

Bike-racing party game Ultimate Sheep Raccoon will launch for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam this winter, developer Clever Endeavour Games announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Clever Endeavour Games:

About

Race to victory through a mayhem-filled obstacle course of deadly traps you’ve built with friends while pulling off sick tricks!

Ultimate Sheep Raccoon is a bike-racing party game where you and your friends build a course of ramps, obstacles, and traps! Dodge hazards, do crazy tricks, and use power-ups to get ahead of the competition. Pedal to victory with up to eight players locally, online, and cross-platform.

Key Features

  • Bike to Victory – Race to the finish on your bikes! With easy-to-pick-up and intuitive controls, everyone can play.
  • Power-Ups – Stay ahead of the competition with power-ups! Lift off with the jetpack, glide safely over threats with the parachute, scatter opponents with mines or stop them in their tracks with honey traps.
  • Blocks and Traps – Build the level together by adding rails, ramps, bouncy pads, speed zones, and other obstacles. Then amp up the difficulty with pendulums, spinning machinery, spikes, and laser-emitting hazards!
  • Sick Tricks – Pull off tricks, do backflips, and wheelies to rack up extra points!
  • Classic Characters – Chicken, Horse, Sheep, and Raccoon return from Ultimate Chicken Horse! Plus a brand-new cast of barnyard buddies.
  • Eight-Player Support – Because four players weren’t enough!
  • Local, Online, and Cross-Platform Multiplayer – Play together on all supported platforms.
  • Custom Level Editor – Build and share your own level designs. Create challenge levels where players compete for the best times, and put together level playlists for a campaign-like experience.

item.title: DOOM: The Dark Ages ‘Update 2’ now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Adds "Ripatorium" endless arena mode and more.

Publisher Bethesda Softworks and developer id Software have released the second major update for DOOM: The Dark Ages, which adds the “Ripatorium” endless arena mode, new combat enhancements, and campaign balance refinements.

Here are the details, via Bethesda Softworks:

Features include:

  • Ripatorium Endless Arena Mode
  • New Combat Enhancements for Dragon, Atlan, and Slayer
  • Full-Campaign Balance Changes and Refinements

Stand And Fight as the super weapon of gods and kings, shred enemies with devastating favorites like the Super Shotgun while also wielding a variety of new bone-chewing weapons, including the versatile Shield Saw. Players will stand and fight on the demon-infested battlefields in the vicious, grounded combat the original DOOM is famous for. Take flight atop the new fierce Mecha Dragon, stand tall in a massive Atlan mech, and beat demons to a pulp with the newly enhanced glory kill system. Only the Slayer has the power to wield these devastating tools of mayhem.

Additional details about the update are available at Bethesda.net.

DOOM: The Dark Ages is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store. It is also available via Game Pass.
